extends java.lang.Object

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      private java.lang.String calculateEstimatedTime()
      calculae the estimated delivery time according to the current time: Between 4:00 to 20:00 the estimated is within loadingTime+distance hours.

      gets the userEntity for send him message
      void initialize()  
      private void refresh​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      This method is responsible for refreshing the deliveries table by requesting all deliveries for the current region from the server
      private void save​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Send to server the deliveries for update Send massage (SMS) to the relevant customers with the estimated arrival time
      private void setupTable()
      setUp the delivery table according to the region Handle delivery status edit: can change from "pendingApproval" to "outForDelivery" or from "outForDelivery" to "done". in other cases, the changes aren't saved
      private void waitToAnswer()
      Waiting to receive the UserEntity from the server

      • refresh

        private void refresh​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method is responsible for refreshing the deliveries table by requesting all deliveries for the current region from the server
        Parameters:
        event - the event that triggered this method (clicking on the refresh button)

      • save

        private void save​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Send to server the deliveries for update Send massage (SMS) to the relevant customers with the estimated arrival time
        Parameters:
        event - current event

      • waitToAnswer

        private void waitToAnswer()
        Waiting to receive the UserEntity from the server

      • setupTable

        private void setupTable()
        setUp the delivery table according to the region Handle delivery status edit: can change from "pendingApproval" to "outForDelivery" or from "outForDelivery" to "done". in other cases, the changes aren't saved

      • colorTableRows

        private void colorTableRows​(javafx.scene.control.TableView<entity.DeliveryEntity> table)
        color tables rows by the current amount and the status

      • calculateEstimatedTime

        private java.lang.String calculateEstimatedTime()
        calculae the estimated delivery time according to the current time: Between 4:00 to 20:00 the estimated is within loadingTime+distance hours. Between 00:00 to 04:00 the estimated is within 5+loadingTime+distance hours . Between 20:00 to 00:00 the estimated is in the next day at current hour+loadingTime+distance hours.

      • getDeliveryEntityFromServer

        public static void getDeliveryEntityFromServer​(java.util.ArrayList<entity.DeliveryEntity> deliveriesArr)
        adding the deliveryEntity to deliveries list
        Parameters:
        deliveriesArr - deliveries array to add

      • getUserEntityFromServer

        public static void getUserEntityFromServer​(entity.UserEntity userEntity)
        gets the userEntity for send him message
        Parameters:
        userEntity - the user entity to send message for
